net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_healDamage
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Remove damage from a token with these parameters in JSON:

arg(0) = An object with enough information to damage a toon
  {
    "id": Id of the token taking healing, or "currentToken"
    "current": Token's current hit points, or property name containing current value
    "maximum": Token's maximum hit points, or property name containing maximum value
    "healing": The amount of haling applied to the token
  }
Current hit points are healed up to maximum.
These token properties must be set: MaxHP, DSPass, DSFail
The Exhaustion 6 state should also be set.
After applying the healing this macro calls dnd5e_applyHealth which sets
the health states Dead/Dying/Stable/Bloodied and the health bars
HP/Damage/DSPass/DSFail/
